resources.string:
Tubble is the Philippines' first-ever laundry aid
mobile platform used to provide and ease commu-
ication channels between laundry service provid-
ers and its consumers. Developed by consumers
who have experienced the inconvenience of hunt-
ing for laundry shops within Metro to help indi-
viduals.

For many years, laundry has played a significant
role in our daily routine. The idea of Tubble is to
create an innovative solution for students and laun-
dry service providers allowing them to co-exist
with each other with ease and convenience.
Disclaimer: Prices are averaged among all branches. For specific price, please contact the laundry shop.
